snippet.title: Say sayonara to salmonella
snippet.description: Color-coded chopping boards by Damian Evans eliminate cross-contamination.

snippet.title: Bacteria-sniffing wand could help prevent foodborne illnesses
snippet.description: Researchers hope their real-time detection system that uses a magnetoelastic sensor can speed up testing at food processing plants.

snippet.title: Get ready for your infections to glow in the dark
snippet.description: A new gel developed for medical practitioners glows under ultraviolet light when bacterias such as Salmonella and E.Coli are present.

snippet.title: Blow here: New breathalyzer may screen for diabetes, lung cancer
snippet.description: Researchers hope to soon be able to test our breath for a wide range of "biomarkers" -- molecules that could indicate the presence of a particular disease.

snippet.title: Fighting germs, Harry Potter-style
snippet.description: UV wand kills food-borne microbes like salmonella and E. coli.

snippet.title: Upcoming Violight cell phone sanitizer zaps germs
snippet.description: Violight, which specializes in UV toothbrush sanitizers, will be selling a cell phone cleaning accessory that incorporates germicidal UV light technology that hospitals use to sterilize medical instruments.

snippet.title: Organic hand sanitizer for crazy parents
snippet.description: Kill em all with CleanWell, says the organic hand sanitizing company.

snippet.title: Violight cell phone sanitizer zaps germs
snippet.description: Violight, which specializes in UV toothbrush sanitizers, has officially begun selling a $49.95 cell phone cleaning accessory that incorporates germicidal UV light technology that hospitals use to sterilize medical instruments.

snippet.title: Clean your fruits and vegetables naturally
snippet.description: This activated oxygen cleaning machine promises to sanitize the foods you eat.
